mapper.select: select bas_alipay_pay_order.id, bas_alipay_pay_order.agent_id as agentId, bas_alipay_pay_order.customer_id as customerId, bas_alipay_pay_order.money, bas_customer.mobile, bas_alipay_pay_order.source_type as sourceType, bas_alipay_pay_order.source_id as sourceId, bas_alipay_pay_order.order_status as orderStatus, bas_alipay_pay_order.payment_id as paymentId, bas_alipay_pay_order.handle_time as handleTime, bas_alipay_pay_order.create_time as createTime, bas_customer.fullname as customerName from bas_alipay_pay_order left join bas_customer on bas_alipay_pay_order.customer_id = bas_customer.id where bas_alipay_pay_order.customer_id = #{customerId} and bas_alipay_pay_order.source_type = #{sourceType} and bas_alipay_pay_order.source_id = #{sourceId} and bas_alipay_pay_order.order_status = #{orderStatus}

select * from bas_alipay_pay_order
where source_id LIKE concat('%',#{sourceId}, '%')

select count(*) from bas_alipay_pay_order join hdg_packet_period_order on bas_alipay_pay_order.source_id = hdg_packet_period_order.id left join bas_customer on bas_alipay_pay_order.customer_id = bas_customer.id
and hdg_packet_period_order.order_refund_id = #{orderRefundId}
mapper.insert: insert into bas_alipay_pay_order(id, partner_id, customer_id, agent_id,money, source_type, source_id, order_status, create_time) values(#{id}, #{partnerId}, #{customerId}, #{agentId}, #{money}, #{sourceType}, #{sourceId}, #{orderStatus}, #{createTime})
